name: Export to Threads
description:
Tired of hacking together multiple tools to share your work and get feedback on it? Now you can export Figma frames to Threads to share them with your team, gather feedback in one place, and present your work.


How it works

  1. Download the Mac desktop app and sign into Threads
  2. Install the "Export to Threads" plugin on Figma
  3. Select frames you want to get feedback on, or present, and press cmd+; to run the plugin and send the frames to Threads desktop
  4. Add context to the frames, tag your teammates, or add video narration to walk through them
  5. Share the link with your team

You can also interact with Figma prototypes directly in Threads as well.


What is Threads

Threads is the missing half of Figma. It makes it easy for you to share your designs, get feedback on them, and present them from one place. If you're getting feedback async, you can even add video narration to your threads to give your teammates additional context.
